mentions.context: Empirical statistical power was computed with the R package MKpower (version 0.5, https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/MKpower/index.html), using the mclust package [23] to estimate distributions with a Gaussian mixture model.
The mask volumes estimations (n=280, 40x7) were computed using the toolbox Simple ITK [21,22] (http://www.simpleitk.org)

We thank Julien Castelneau, Inria software engineer for his help in the development of MedInria Software (MedInria -Medical image visualization and processing software by Inria https://med.inria.fr-RRID:SCR_001462).
We thank Julien Castelneau, software Engineer Inria, for his help in the development of MedInria Software.
First, the readers were asked to segment the whole prostate gland (using a polygon segmentation), with the open-source MedInria software [20].

Empirical statistical power was computed with the R package MKpower (version 0.5, https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/MKpower/index.html), using the mclust package [23] to estimate distributions with a Gaussian mixture model.

Empirical statistical power was computed with the R package MKpower (version 0.5, https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/MKpower/index.html), using the mclust package [23] to estimate distributions with a Gaussian mixture model.
